trans-unit.source: Represents a set of one or more <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment" /> elements.
trans-unit.target: 表示一個或多個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment" /> 項目的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments> element defines the structure and content of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments>結構和內容的項目會定義<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments> is the root of one or more <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment> elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments> 是一或多個根<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment>項目。

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about the document structure of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)], see Chapter 9 and Appendix E of the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* that can be downloaded from the [Windows Hardware Developer Central](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: 如需文件結構的詳細資訊[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]，請參閱第 9 章和附錄 E *XML Paper Specification (XPS)*可以從下載[Windows 硬體開發人員中心](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments> element in an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments>中的項目[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment" /> to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment" /> 加入至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 未實作。

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 未實作。

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 未實作。

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 未實作。

trans-unit.source: The child object to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的子物件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a child object to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments" />.
trans-unit.target: 將子物件加入至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Only a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment> can be a child of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments> and there must be at least one child.
trans-unit.target: 只有<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragment>可以成為子系<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments>而且必須有至少一個子系。

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: 要加入物件中的文字。

trans-unit.source: Adds the text content of a node to the object.
trans-unit.target: 將節點的文字內容加入物件中。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。
